title: Alan Wake 2
description: Alan Wake 2 is a survival horror game that combines intense psychological terror with a meta-narrative, following two protagonists: FBI agent Saga Anderson, who investigates ritualistic murders in the Pacific Northwest, and author Alan Wake, who is trapped in a nightmarish alternate dimension called the Dark Place. Players must survive by using light against supernatural enemies, solving puzzles, and exploring two contrasting worldsâ€”the picturesque but corrupted Bright Falls and the terrifying, reality-bending Dark Place.
Re_system_requirements: VIDEO CARD: GeForce RTX 3060 / Radeon RX 6600 XT 8GB
Min_system_requirements: VIDEO CARD: GeForce RTX 2060 / Radeon RX 6600 6GB

title: Assassin's Creed 2
description: Assassin's Creed II is an action-adventure game played from a third-person perspective and set in an open world based on late 15th-century Renaissance Italy. Gameplay is nonlinear, and focuses on hack and slash combat, stealth, and exploration.
Re_system_requirements: CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E6700 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ or better
RAM: 1.5 GB Windows XP / 2 GB Windows Vista - Windows 7
VIDEO CARD: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4700 or better
OS: Windows XP (32 and 64 bit) / Windows Vista (32 and 64 bit) / Windows 7 (32 and 64 bit)
Min_system_requirements: CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4 GHz
CPU SPEED: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4 GHz
RAM: 1.5 GB Windows XP / 2 GB Windows Vista - Windows 7
VIDEO CARD: 256 MB DirectX 9.0-compliant card with Shader Model 3.0 or higher (NVIDIA GeForce 7/8/9/100/200 series / ATI RADEON X1950, HD 2000/3000/4000/5000 series)
OS: Windows XP (32 and 64 bit) / Windows Vista (32 and 64 bit) / Windows 7 (32 and 64 bit)

title: Assassin's Creed 3
description: Assassin's Creed 3 is an action-adventure game set during the American Revolution where you play as Connor, a Native American assassin. He fights against the Templars amidst the conflict between the American colonists and the British, using a blend of traditional weapons like tomahawks and firearms. The game features a vast, new open world with both city and frontier environments, enhanced by a new engine that brought new physics, animation, and weather systems. It also introduces naval combat and an updated multiplayer mode.
Re_system_requirements: CPU: 2.6 GHz Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 or 3.0 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 940
VIDEO CARD: 1024 MB DirectX 10 compliant with Shader Model 5.0 or higher (GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 6850)
Min_system_requirements: CPU: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 or 2.66 GHz AMD Athlon II X4 620
VIDEO CARD: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c-compliant with Shader Model 4.0 or higher (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 4850)
